verses.content: LALPA chun Mosie a biek a,
“Israel thla, mipuihai po po chu hril la, an kuomah, ‘In inthieng ding a nih, kei LALPA in Pathien hi kân thieng sih a.
Mi tinin in nu le pa in ṭi ding a na; chun, ka châwlnihai chu in inser ding a nih; Kei hi LALPA in Pathien chu ka nih.
Milim tieng chun thle naw unla, milim sung fâwm pathienhai in ta dingin insiem naw ro; Kei hi LALPA in Pathien chu ka nih.
“LALPA kuoma inremna thilin- hlâna in inthâwi pha chun, pawm tlâk ni dingin in inhlân ding a nih.
In inhlân ni tak amanih, a zîng tûka mania fâk ding a na; ni thum chena um a la um chun raw ding a nih.
Ni thum nia fâk a ni chun thil tirdakum a na, pawm ni naw nih,
chun, a fatu taphawt chun LALPA thil inthieng chu a suk- pawrche leiin a rîtlona maw chu phur a ta, ama chu a chipuihai laia inthawkin tuithlârin um lem a tih.
“In loa bu dâm in sîk pha in lohnâwm kil rawt chenin in sîk ding a ni nawh a, lâk ṭhelhai chu pâwl tlâk hnungin in lâk khâwm ding a ni bawk nawh.

In grêp huona lo ṭhelhai in zawng nâwk ding a ni nawh a, in grêp huona a ra ṭilhai in rût khâwm ding a ni bawk nawh; mi rimsihai le ram dang mihai in hlapêk ding a nih; Kei hi LALPA in Pathien chu ka nih.
“Inru naw unla, mî hlêm naw unla, khêl hril bawk naw ro.
In Pathien hming hrilse dingin ka hming sâlin khêlin in inkhâm ding a ni nawh; Kei hi LALPA in Pathien chu ka nih.
“I tuolbâwmhai i hnawchêp ding a ni nawh a, în rûkpêk ding a ni bawk nawh. Inhlawfa hlaw chu zânkhuoin a zînga chen i hrênpêk ding a ni nawh.
Nasêt chu ṭawngsie în phur ding a ni nawh a, mitdel hmaah inpal thlûkna i sie ding a ni bawk nawh; i Pathien chu i ṭi ding a ni lem; Kei hi LALPA chu ka nih.
“Rorêlnaa chun fellotakin in rêl ding a ni nawh, mi rimsi chu i thlier ding a ni nawh a, mi thilthawthei în za chuong ding a ni bawk nawh, feltakin i tuolbâwm ro chu i rêlpêk ding a nih.
I chipuihai lai mihai hêkin în vâk vêl ruoi ding a ni nawh a, i tuolbâwm thisen thuah a ni naw zâwngin i ṭhang ding a ni bawk nawh; Kei hi LALPA chu ka nih.
I lungrilin i unau i theida ding a ni nawh, i tuolbâwm chu i kâwk ngei ding a nih, a suolnaa în thiengna dingin.
Phuba i lâk ding a ni nawh a, i chipuihai theidâna i pâi ding a ni bawk nawh a, nang le nang în hmangai angin i tuolbâwm chu i hmangai ding a ni lem: Kei hi LALPA chu ka nih.
“Ka thupêkhai in pawm ding a nih. I ran chu chi tum tum inthlatir naw rawh; i loah thlaichi chi hni chîng naw la, thil chi hni khâwng pawl puon i sil ding a ni bawk nawh.
“Tukhawm suoknu, pasal huol- tu nei, lân tlan lo, lân suoktir lo le zâl hmunkhat taphawt chu hrem nîng a ta, sukhlum chu ni êm naw nih a, ama chu insuo lo a la ni leiin.
Intuokna kawtkhâr bulah LALPA kuoma a bawsiet thâwina dingin, bawsiet thâwina berâmchal a hung kei ding a nih.
Chun, a thil suksuol taha baw- siet inthâwina dingin thiempu chun berâmchalin LALPA hmaah intlanna siempêk a tih; chuongchun, a thil suksuolnaa chun ngaidam nîng a tih.

“Ram chu in va hluoh a, fâk dinga theikûng chi tinrêng in phun pha chun, a ra chu in ta dinga thieng- nawah in ngai ding a nih; in ta dingin kum thum sûng chu inthieng nawa ngai ding a na, fâk dêr lo ding a nih.
Amiruokchu, a kum li kum chun a ra po po chu suktum ding a nih a, LALPA inpâkna thilinhlân ding a nih.
A kum nga kum ruok chun, in ta dinga a pung pei theina dingin a ra chu in fâk ding a nih: Kei LALPA in Pathien chu ka nih.
“Ieng sa khawm a thisen pumin in fâk ding a ni nawh. Dawi dâm hmangin aisân dâm in ching ding a ni nawh.
I bekbawra inthawkin a vêlin i lu i vaw ding a ni nawh a, i khâkhmul a sîrtuokin i tan ding a ni bawk nawh.
Mithi leiin in taksa in ât ding a ni nawh a, in inṭiel ding a ni bawk nawh; Kei hi LALPA in Pathien chu ka nih.
Nawchizawra siem dingin i nau- nu chu sukpawrche naw rawh; ram chu uiretna ramah hung inchang a ta, rîtlonain hung sip rawi a tih.
Ka châwlnihai chu in inser ding a na, ka hmun inthieng chu in inza ding a nih: Kei hi LALPA in Pathien chu ka nih.
“Khawhri aisânthiem zâwlhai chu pan naw unla, dâwithiemhai khawm in pawrche phâna dingin zawng suok naw ro: Kei hi LALPA in Pathien chu ka nih.
“Lua kêlsam ṭohai hmaa chun i ngîr pei ding a na, tar hmêl chu în za ding a na, i Pathien chu i ṭi ding a nih; Kei hi LALPA chu ka nih.
“Ram dang mi in rama khawsa ve an um chun in sukse ding a ni nawh.

Ram dang mi nangni laia khawsahai chu in ta dingin a ram mi ang hrim an ni ding a nih; nangma i înhmangai angin i hmangai ding a nih; nangni khawm Aigupta rama khan ram dang mi in ni kha: Kei hi LALPA in Pathien chu ka nih.
“Rorêl thua dâm, seizie in- khinaa dâm, bûknaa dâm, tamzie inkhinaa dâm indik nawtakin in thaw ding a ni nawh.
Khâina indiktak, bûkna indik- tak, epha indiktak, hin indiktak in nei ngei ding a nih: Kei hi LALPA in Pathien, Aigupta rama inthawka ṭhuoi suoktu cheu ka nih.
Chun, ka thupêkhai po po le ka rorêlhai po po chu zâwmin in thaw ding a nih: Kei hi LALPA chu ka nih,’ ti rawh,” tiin.
